communication_behavior.engagement_level: high (quick replies to raise concerns), low (for complex solutions)

deal_dynamics_risk_assessment.budget_risk_indicators: very high (explicit $90K cap, strong resistance to price)
deal_dynamics_risk_assessment.timeline_risk_indicators: high (no time for long rollout, wants out-of-the-box)
deal_dynamics_risk_assessment.churn_risk_indicators: high (mentioned other vendors, deal paused, contingent on leadership interest)

deal_insights.key_objections: price (too high, over $90K cap), perceived lack of immediate value/fit, desire for out-of-the-box solution, competition
deal_insights.competitive_position: unfavorable (explicitly stated 'priciest' and considering other vendors)
